drivetext:
Inside the HKN drive you will find all the useful material for the preparation and study of the exams we have to face.
All material is provided to the students by the students, managed by us.
Good study!

abouttext:
WHO WE ARE:
We are the first European chapter of IEEE-Eta Kappa Nu (HKN), at Politecnico di Torino.

WHAT WE DO:
Our activities range from educational tutoring to the organization of events such as workshops and seminars, with the aim of improving our skills and helping out our colleagues.

HKN:

noQuestions: There aren't any questions to answer
help_admin_text:
ğŸ”§Here is the list of commands for handling questions:
 - /reply: used to answer the question, write the answer directly and press enter, the answer will be sent only to the user who asked the question.
 - /skip: will allow you to skip the question, in so that you can answer it later.
 - /delete: will remove the question from the file of saved questions not yet answered.
 - /save: allows you to save the question in a specific file.
 - /cancel: use it to leave the conversation.
 - /showpending: show questions that have not yet been answered.
 - /showsaved: show questions saved with the command /save.
